sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Paper, Dialog, DialogTitle, DialogContent, DialogActions, Button, Typography, Box, Chip, Rating, } from '@mui/material'; import { LocationOn, AccessTime, AttachMoney, Language, } from '@mui/icons-material'; interface Destination { id: number; name: string; country: string; image: string; description: string; bestTimeToVisit: string; averageCost: string; rating: number; language: string; attractions: string[]; currency: string; } const destinations: Destination[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'Santorini', country: 'Greece', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1613395877344-13d4a8e0d49e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80', description: 'Famous for its stunning white-washed buildings, blue-domed churches, and spectacular sunsets over the Aegean Sea.', bestTimeToVisit: 'April to October', averageCost: '$150-200 per day', rating: 4.8, language: 'Greek', attractions: ['Oia Village', 'Fira', 'Red Beach', 'Ancient Thera'], currency: 'Euro (EUR)', }, { id: 2, name: 'Kyoto', country: 'Japan', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1493976040374-85c8e12f0c0e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80', description: 'Historic city known for its classical Buddhist temples, gardens, imperial palaces, and traditional wooden houses.', bestTimeToVisit: 'March-May and October-November', averageCost: '$130-180 per day', rating: 4.7, language: 'Japanese', attractions: ['Kinkaku-ji', 'Fushimi Inari Shrine', 'Arashiyama Bamboo Grove'], currency: 'Japanese Yen (JPY)', }, { id: 3, name: 'Machu Picchu', country: 'Peru', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1526392060635-9d6019884377?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80', description: 'Ancient Incan city set high in the Andes Mountains, featuring incredible stone architecture and breathtaking mountain views.', bestTimeToVisit: 'April to October', averageCost: '$120-170 per day', rating: 4.9, language: 'Spanish', attractions: ['Sun Gate', 'Huayna Picchu', 'Temple of the Sun'], currency: 'Peruvian Sol (PEN)', }, { id: 4, name: 'Dubai', country: 'UAE', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512453979798-5ea266f8880c?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80', description: 'Ultra-modern city known for luxury shopping, futuristic architecture, and vibrant nightlife.', bestTimeToVisit: 'November to March', averageCost: '$200-300 per day', rating: 4.6, language: 'Arabic', attractions: ['Burj Khalifa', 'Dubai Mall', 'Palm Jumeirah', 'Desert Safari'], currency: 'UAE Dirham (AED)', }, { id: 5, name: 'Amalfi Coast', country: 'Italy', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1533587851505-d119e13fa0d7?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80', description: 'Stunning stretch of coastline known for its picturesque towns, dramatic cliffs, and crystal-clear waters.', bestTimeToVisit: 'May to October', averageCost: '$170-250 per day', rating: 4.7, language: 'Italian', attractions: ['Positano', 'Ravello', 'Path of the Gods', 'Amalfi Cathedral'], currency: 'Euro (EUR)', }, ]; const Trips = () => { const [selectedDestination, setSelectedDestination] = useState(null); return ( Explore Amazing Destinations Destination Country Best Time to Visit Average Cost Rating Action {destinations.map((destination) => ( {destination.name} {destination.country} {destination.bestTimeToVisit} {destination.averageCost} ))}
setSelectedDestination(null)} maxWidth="md" fullWidth > {selectedDestination && ( <> {selectedDestination.name}, {selectedDestination.country} {selectedDestination.description} Best Time: {selectedDestination.bestTimeToVisit} {selectedDestination.averageCost} {selectedDestination.language} Popular Attractions {selectedDestination.attractions.map((attraction) => ( } variant="outlined" /> ))} )} ); }; export default Trips;
